altTitles.zh-ro: Si Ling Fashi! Wo Ji Shi Tianzai
Sǐ Líng Fǎshī! Wǒ Jí Shì Tiānzāi

description.en:
In a world where magic and monsters exist, Lin Moyu has hit the age of acquiring his very own profession. While most would be lucky just to obtain a high-level combat class, Moyu becomes the ultrarare necromancer!

Being the first and only one of his kind, he has no idea of the potential he possesses on his journey to level up and face great challenges.

What new heights will Moyu achieve with his unique army of undead?
description.zh: 游戏降临现实，世界规则颠覆，人类进入全民转职时代。 唯有成为转职者！升级变强！方能站上世界之巅！ 转职当天，林默语成为唯一性隐藏职业，死灵法师。 从此召唤物不死绝，林默语便不会死。 “我高坐骸骨神座，行走生死之间。” “我即是天灾！”

altTitles.en: I'll Be a Villain in This Life

description.en:
Lee Joohyuk, and undercover detective, has spent 15 years infiltrating the corporate-style gang DG Group. He was planning on revealing the evil-doings of the DG Group to the world, toppling them, until… 

"Have a nice trip."

His identity was uncovered, and he was kicked out of the organization. Just as the life faded from his eyes, an apparition of his father, a former hero, appeared. 

"Son, return here only after achieving the dream you so desire."

Joohyuk was sent back to the year 2005. 

"This time! Certainly, I’ll bring you down with my own two hands!"

In an era where scoundrels and scum run rampant, I will become a villain, in order to eliminate all evil.
description.fr: Lee Joohyuk, et détective infiltré, a passé 15 ans à infiltrer le gang de style « DG Group ». Il prévoyait de révéler les méfaits du groupe DG à tout le monde, de les renverser… "Bon voyage." Son identité a été découverte et il a été expulsé de l'organisation. Juste au moment où la vie s'estompait de ses yeux, une apparition de son père, un ancien héros, est apparue. "Fils, ne reviens ici qu'après avoir réalisé le rêve que tu désires tant." Joohyuk a été renvoyé en 2005. « Cette fois ! Certainement, je vais vous abattre de mes propres mains ! » À une époque où les scélérats et les racailles sévissent, je deviendrai un méchant, afin d'éliminer tout mal.

altTitles.ja: 令和のダラさん

description.en:
Seeing it brings misfortune; defiling it brings a curse? Introducing a new era of strangeness, abandoning seriousness!

On a stormy day, a landslide destroys a fence, and siblings who ventured into a long-prohibited area encounter a terrifyingly bizarre creature...
"I'm a curse god, you know!? Don't you think anything of this grotesque form?!?"
The unflappable siblings, rather than being scared, casually call the creature "Dara-San" and grow fond of it!?

Seemingly scary but not at all! A new era of occult comedy that leaves seriousness behind.
___
[Official X Account](https://twitter.com/darasan_PR)
description.es:
Verlo trae desgracia; profanarlo, trae una maldición... Introduciendo una nueva era de extrañeza, ¡abandonando la seriedad!

En un día de tormenta, un desprendimiento de tierra destruye una cerca, y unos hermanos que se aventuraron en una zona prohibida durante mucho tiempo se encuentran con una criatura terroríficamente extraña...
"¡Soy un dios maldito! ¡¿No te importa nada esta forma grotesca?!?"
Los imperturbables hermanos, en lugar de asustarse, llaman casualmente a la criatura "Dara-San" y ¡le cogen cariño!?

Parece que da miedo, ¡pero no! Una nueva era de comedia ocultista que deja atrás la seriedad.
description.es-la:
Verlo trae desgracia; profanarlo, trae una maldición... Introduciendo una nueva era de extrañeza, ¡abandonando la seriedad!

En un día de tormenta, un desprendimiento de tierra destruye una cerca, y unos hermanos que se aventuraron en una zona prohibida durante mucho tiempo se encuentran con una criatura terroríficamente extraña...
"¡Soy un dios maldito! ¡¿No te importa nada esta forma grotesca?!?"

Parece que da miedo, ¡pero no! Una nueva era de comedia ocultista que deja atrás la seriedad.

altTitles.vi: Sứa không thể bơi trong đêm

altTitles.en: Jellyfish Can't Swim in the Night

altTitles.ja: 夜のクラゲは泳げない

description.en: Four girls, an illustrator, a former idol, a VTuber, and a composer, form an anonymous artist group called "JELEE", each pursuing their artistic dreams while supporting one another.

A sweet contract romance between a vampire and a human! Siyun accidentally meets Jinwoo, a famous vampire director of a well-known foundation, at a café. He offers him a matching partner proposal where he would provide him with his blood. "I’m already anemic and short on blood—why me of all people?!" As their affection deepens, what will become of them?

title.en: My New Friend Wasn't What I Expected

altTitles.ja: 新しくできた友達が思ってたのと違った話

altTitles.ja-ro: Atarashiku Dekita Tomodachi ga Omotteta no to Chigatta Hanashi

description.en: First impressions are important, but they're not the whole story...
description.pt-br: A garota que sentada ao meu lado é muito fofa, e isso é muito bom por si só. Mas então eu a conheci fora da escola... OH, MEU!!!

description.en: I chose to do what I could to immediately pay off my debt, and for me, that was sales. And I was given another chance at it.

The whole company knew that they they were polar opposites who fought like cats and dogs. Yet during the year-end party, the wall between them shattered after they got drunk! And so the two of them went from always being close to going off on each other to feeling very strange things following the accidental mishap...

title.en: How to Survive as a Dragon with Time-Limit

altTitles.en: Survival Guide for a terminally-ill Dragon

description.en:
At the end of my terminally-ill life, I found myself reincarnated as a dragon in a webtoon. Once again, a life with a terminal illness, but this time, as a dragon?!

Lois, born with the heritage of the strongest creature in the world with wealth and thousands of years of lifespan as a dragon.

However, facing unpredictable crises at every turn, not knowing when I’ll die—what kind of Bullshit is this?!

It’s too unjust to just quietly die like this. Utilizing the future knowledge I have, I’ll survive like a villain and give this story a twist!

title.en: The Sweet Life of a Reincarnation Pro

altTitles.en: Sweet Honey of the Reincarnated Pro

altTitles.ja: 転生のプロが甘い蜜を吸う方法

altTitles.en: How a Former Pro Takes Advantage by Doing an Easy Job

description.en:
Arel may have been born as a prince of the Ernesia Kingdom, but this is actually his 101st life! 

He has been reborn into multiple types of universes that were full of magic, qi, and even spaceships. So this isn't his first fantasy world, and he's going to make use of his magic knowledge to take it easy. 

His past 100 lives have taught him that the best way to avoid dying young is to keep his head down and make lots of money. But let's see if this reincarnation pro can finally live the sweet life!

altTitles.ja: サキュバスがやってきたお話

altTitles.en: The Story of a Succubus Who Came to the Human World

description.en: The story of a Succubus who comes to the human world to absorb life force energy. Accidentally, she lives as a child in a strange man's house.

altTitles.ja: 結界師への転生

description.en:
By the time he opened his eyes, Kubota Tamotsu (34 years old) has been reincarnated into another world. Moreover, as a 6 years old slave with “Level 1 Barrier” skill. To surpass his limitations and become a powerful Barrier master Kubota begins a hellish training, full of obstacles and struggles. — From “Let’s Become a Novelist”, a new other world fantasy starts!  
  
[Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n3631do/)  
[Light Novel](https://bookwalker.jp/series/130407/)
description.pt-br: Kubota Tamotsu um trabalhador de 34 anos desmaia depois de descobrir que sua equipe se demitiu e ele não poderá cumprir o prazo de entrega, quando ele abre os olhos ele está em um outro mundo, confuso ele descobre que reencarnou como um escravo de 6 anos com uma habilidade de Barreira Level 1. Para superar suas limitações e se tornar um poderoso mestre de barreiras, Kubota começa um treinamento infernal, cheio de obstáculos e lutas.Uma nova fantasia começa!

altTitles.ja: ねずみロワイアル

altTitles.vi: Cuộc chiến sinh tử của những chú chuột

description.en: We were taken to some island, thinking it was a school trip. What was declared there was the beginning of a battle to the death. It seems only five people can board the boat that will come 28 days later... Nishibe, indecisive and timid, is bewildered by the sudden event. Can he really survive? The cute and deadly mouse deathmatch begins."
description.ja: 修学旅行だと思って連れてかれたどこかの島。そこで宣告されたのは殺し合いが始まることだった。２８日後に来る迎えの舟に乗れるのは５人だけらしい・・・・。突然の出来事にうろたえる優柔不断で弱気な西部（にしべ）君。果たして彼は生き残ることができるのか。かわいくてみえてくらっちゃう、ねずみデスゲーム開幕。

description.en:
Hae Jin has a father who devoted his whole life to finding the national artifacts that were smuggled out of the country.
Then one day, after receiving an unknown “artifact” sent by his father, whom he had lost contact with for a long time, a strange light suddenly came from it, granting Hae Jin a mysterious “power” and a “mission”…
“The magic of the Heavenly Object has been bestowed upon you.”
Thus, an adventure involving the artifacts scattered all over the world, including the ” Three Heavenly Objects”, which contains the soul of the Korean people, begins!

altTitles.ja: 負けヒロインが多すぎる！@comic

altTitles.vi: Có Quá Nhiều Nữ Chính Thua Cuộc! @comic

description.en:
***“Huh? Who are you calling losing?”***

As the background of the class, I, Kazuhiko Nukumizu, witnessed a popular girl–Anna Yanami, getting rejected by another guy.

_“Even though he said we’ll get married. Don’t you think he’s pretty mean?”
“When did he say that?”
“When we were 4 or 5 years old.”_

That doesn’t count, right? With this, the losing heroines like Remon Yakishio from the Track and Field Club, and Chika Komari, from the literature club.

_“Nukumizu-kun. There are two types of girls. Childhood friends or cheating cats.”
“I see. Well, that’s a bold statement.”_

There’s a fortune for those who shine only after losing. Losing Heroines—The curtain to the mysterious coming-of-age story “Makeine” opens now!
  
---

**Links:**  
- [Official LN (JP)](https://www.shogakukan.co.jp/books/09453017)
- [Alternative Raw](https://shogakukan-comic.jp/book-series?cd=51545)
description.ja:
クラスの背景モブ高校生こと温水和彦は、男子に人気のクラスメート・八奈見杏菜が幼馴染にフラれるのを目撃してしまう。
仕方なく八奈見を慰める温水だが、それをきっかけに、様々な負け感あふれる女子たちに絡まれることになり――!?
負けヒロイン――マケインたちと辿る謎の青春が、ここに幕を開ける！
負けてこそ輝く彼女たちに、幸いあれ。
description.vi:
“Hử? Cậu gọi ai là đồ thua cuộc cơ?”

Tôi, Kazuhiko Nukumizu, một nhân vật làm nền trong lớp, chứng kiến cảnh cô nàng nổi tiếng – Anna Yanami bị một nam sinh khác từ chối.

“Dù cho cậu ấy đã từng nói bọn mình sẽ kết hôn đấy. Cậu có thấy cậu ấy quá đáng không?”

“Cậu ấy nói thế vào lúc nào vậy?”

“Hồi bọn tớ 4 hay 5 tuổi gì đó.”

Thế thì đâu có tính?

Cùng với cô nàng còn có những nữ chính thua cuộc khác như Remon Yakishio của Câu lạc bộ Điền kinh và Komari Chika từ Câu lạc bộ Văn học.

“Nukumizu-kun nè, trên đời có hai loại con gái. Một là bạn thuở nhỏ, còn lại là đồ đàn bà giựt bồ.”

“Vậy hả. Chà, một tuyên bố đầy táo bạo ha.”

Có một loại vận mệnh rằng có những người chỉ thực sự toả sáng sau khi đã thua cuộc.

Những nữ chính thua cuộc—Bức màn câu chuyện tuổi mới lớn mang tên “Makein” sẽ lật mở ngay bây giờ!
description.es-la: "¿Eh? ¿A quién llamas perdedor?" Como fondo de la clase, yo, Kazuhiko Nukumizu, fui testigo de cómo una chica popular -Anna Yanami- era rechazada por otro chico. "Aunque dijo que nos casaríamos. ¿No crees que es bastante malo?" "¿Cuándo dijo eso?" "Cuando teníamos 4 o 5 años". Eso no cuenta, ¿verdad? Con esto, las heroínas perdedoras como Remon Yakishio del Club de Atletismo, y Chika Komari, del club de literatura. "Nukumizu-kun. Hay dos tipos de chicas. Las amigas de la infancia o las gatas tramposas". "Ya veo. Bueno, esa es una declaración audaz". Hay una fortuna para los que brillan sólo después de perder. ¡Heroínas perdedoras-El telón de la misteriosa historia de madurez "Makeine" se abre ahora! ["Makeine" es la abreviación del nombre del manga]

description.en: ’99 Boss’ (meaning the best fighter among those born in 1999). The protagonist, Na Seon-wook, was born with the heart of a tiger. He was a troublemaker, but at the request of his parents, he hid his strength and transferred to Gukyang High School, a school located in a remote area that he thought would be quiet. However, it was a place where various old-fashioned cultures and dangerous people gathered. Seon-wook, who wanted to graduate quietly, eventually he couldn’t help but feel his hot blood and began educating them!

altTitles.ja: 影姫　－KAGE HIME－

description.en:
The story follows Niimi Soichiro, a third-year art college student, who is dedicated to creating sculptures of beautiful breasts and seeking the ultimate beauty. One night, he is attacked by a yokai and meets Kagehime, a Shadow Princess who fights yokai. In order for Kagehime to operate in the human world, she needs a physical body, and Soichiro agrees to create one for her.

The series combines elements of comedy, fantasy, and action, with unique partnership between the eccentric art student and the adorable yokai.
description.ja: 諏訪美術大学３年・彫刻学科研究室の新美創一朗は美しいおっぱいを追求し、理想の女体を求めて作品を制作していたが、ある夜妖怪に襲われ、妖怪を退治する影姫と出会う。彼女が人間界で活動するには塑体が必要で創一朗は彼女の身体を作ることに!?

altTitles.en: The Worthy One to the Heaven

altTitles.es: El Guerrero Digno de los Cielos

description.en: In an age of evil where all humans are being hunted by Spirits, chaos broke out after a Monster destroyed an entire city, thus igniting a battle between gods and demons. But among so much darkness there will always be light, and this will come from the hands of Ding Xiao who will seek to fight against these evil spirits, thus becoming the greatest spiritual master, although the question is: will he be the one to Ascend to touch the sky? Or will he be tempted to turn Evil?
description.es: En una era de maldad donde todos los humanos están siendo cazados por Espíritus, se desató el caos luego de que un Monstruo incitado por la codicia destruyera una ciudad completa, iniciando así una batalla entre dioses y demonios. Pero entre tanta oscuridad siempre habrá luz, y esta vendrá de las manos de Ding Xiao quien buscara luchar contra estos espíritus malignos, convirtiéndose así en el más grande maestro espiritual, aunque la duda es: ¿Él será el indicado para Ascender hasta tocar el cielo o será tentado para volverse Malvado?

title.en: One Hundred and Eight Ways to Discuss About the Villain's Pretentious Crappiness

altTitles.en: Lun Fanpai Bai Lan De Yibai Ling Ba Zhong Fangshi

altTitles.zh: 论反派摆烂的一百零八种方式

description.en:
Meng Guiti originally thought she would be the most powerful cultivator in the world. But she one day realized she is just number one cannon fodder and this world is a novel she knew from her previous life. After being aware of that, she was stuck in hundreds of loops throughout her lives. In short, she is doomed to fail. She can't fight against the Fated Chosen, she couldn't even steal their fates. She could only follow the plot to maintain such a life, in hope to reach the end.

Meng Guiti: I'm tired! Now I just want to lie down. Everyone, do whatever you want!

altTitles.en: Become a Legend as an All-Rounder

description.en: Kim Tae-seok, who worked on a construction site, receives a notice of passing the document screening for the major company El Sung. At the same time, a message pops up in front of him: 'You have entered the path to becoming a regular employee tutorial. Would you like to proceed?' Follow Kim Tae-seok's struggle to become the legendary all-around employee in this corporate adventure!

altTitles.ja: ダンジョンリセット

description.de:
Dawoons normales Leben wird auf den Kopf gestellt, als er in den Dungeon gerufen wird, wo er ein tödliches Spiel gegen gefährliche Monster und lebensbedrohliche Fallen spielen muss. Was die Sache schlimmer macht, ist, er ist nur ein einfacher Handwerker mit null Kampffähigkeiten. Aber nachdem Dawoon in eine Falle gerät und einen fehlerhaften Reset überlebt, hat er willkürliche und dennoch sehr hilfreiche Fähigkeiten. Zusammen mit einem blutrünstigen Gefährten und einem niedlichen Eichhörnchen muss er sich etwas einfallen lassen, um das Spiel zu gewinnen und nach Hause zurückzukehren. Welche Abenteuer erwarten ihn in den Tunneln – jetzt, wo die Regeln für ihn scheinbar nicht mehr gültig sind?

---
- [Official German Translation](https://www.tappytoon.com/de/comics/dungeon-reset-de)
description.en: Dawoon's ordinary life is turned upside down when he is summoned into the Dungeon, where he must play a deadly game, outlasting dangerous monsters and life-threatening traps. To make matters worse, he's only a mere crafter with zero combat abilities. But after Dawoon falls into a trap and survives after a glitched reset, he's gained random but oddly helpful skills. He'll need to get creative to clear the game and return home, with a bloodthirsty assistant and an adorable ground squirrel along for the ride. Now that the rules no longer apply to him, what possibilities await in the tunnels below.
description.fa: ⁧⁧   وقتی که بازنشانی شروع بشه، همه چیز به حالت قبلش برای شرکت کننده های بعدی برمیگرده، چرا بازنشانی روی من کار نمیکنه؟! با یک مهارت ساده بازی برای جئونگ داوون درون دانجن شروع میشه .
description.fr:
La vie ordinaire de Dawoon bascule le jour où il se retrouve invoqué dans un monde parallère, dans lequel il va devoir jouer à un jeu mortel intitulé Dungeon Game. Il se retrouve ainsi obligé à faire face à de dangereuses créatures, ainsi qu'à de nombreux pièges mettant constamment sa vie en péril. Et comme si cette situation ne suffisait pas, il s'avère également que l'abilité dont il a été doté est totalement inutile en combat. Néanmoins, après être tombé dans un piège et avoir mystérieusement survécu, un étrange bug va lui donner de nouvelles compétences aléatoires, mais étrangement utiles. Il va devoir redoubler d'astuce pour finir le jeu et pouvoir enfin rentrer chez lui, tout en ayant à ses côtés un Assistant de jeu assoiffé de sang, et un adorable petit écureuil. Maintenant qu'il n'a plus aucune règle à suivre avec assiduité, que va-t-il se passer pour lui dans cet étrange univers ?

---
- [Official French Translation](https://www.tappytoon.com/fr/comics/dungeon-reset-fr)
description.ja:
｢このダンジョンはリセットされます｣ 一度プレイしたダンジョンや罠は次の｢ユーザー｣のためにリセットされる。 しかしその｢リセット｣が俺には適応されない！？ 絶えずリセットされるダンジョンで唯一自由の身となった「奏多」。 その場しのぎで武装した｢バグ｣人間 定岡奏多のダンジョン開拓期が始まるーー！

---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/40532)
description.ko:
[던전이 리셋됩니다.]

한번 플레이한 던전이나 함정은 다음 '유저'들을 위해 '리셋'이라는 과정을 거친다.
그 '리셋'이, '나'에게는 적용되지 않는다?!


끊임없이 리셋되는 던전에서 유일하게 자유로워진 존재.
압도적인 노가다로 무장한 '버그 종자' 정다운의 던전 개척기가 시작된다!

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%8D%98%EC%A0%84-%EB%A6%AC%EC%85%8B/2373)
description.ru: [Идет перезагрузка Подземелья.] Подземелье или ловушки, в которых была игра, проходят стадию перезагрузки для следующих пользователей.Может, эта «перезагрузка» применима и ко мне?! Единственное существо, которое свободно от постоянно перезапускаемой Пещеры. Вооружившись грандиозной силой, Чон Да Ун начинает освоение Подземелья!
description.th:
[ดันเจี้ยนกำลังรีเซ็ต]  
เมื่อมีการเดินสำรวจดันเจี้ยนเกิดขึ้น, กับดักทุกอย่างเริ่มทำงาน, มันก็จะเริ่มทำการรีเซ็ตตัวเองเพื่อสำหรับ "ผู้เล่น" คนต่อไป  
แต่ทว่าการรีเซ็ตเหล่านั้นดันใช้ไม่ได้กับฉัน! ฉันจะต้องอยู่อย่างไร้จุดหมายในดันเจี้ยนแห่งนี้อย่างไร้กำหนด, ฉัน, จัง ดาอุน  
"เจ้าข้อผิดพลาด" ได้ได้เวลาเริ่มออกสำรวจดันเจี้ยนแห่งนี้แล้ว!
description.zh-hk:
［副本即將重置。］

為提供下一批「玩家」體驗，
已通過的副本、已觸發的陷阱
都會經過名為重置的過程。
然而，那所謂的「重置」居然對「我」不管用?!

在不斷重置的副本裡，身為唯一的自由之身，
只能把苦力活做好做滿，「農起來」武裝自己，
「Bug仔」鄭多運的副本開墾記就此展開!

---
- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E5%89%AF%E6%9C%AC%E9%87%8D%E7%BD%AE/140)

altTitles.ja: とある暗部の少女共棲

description.en:
In Academy City, where esper abilities have been recognized as a general science. Behind the peace, there is a dark side organization that undertakes missions that cannot be made public.

"Item" is an elite unit consisting of four girls. Takitsubo Rikou is able to read and track the weak power emitted by those with abilities. Frenda Seivelun, who excels in combat using explosives and traps. Kinuhata Saiai, who can manipulate nitrogen at will and plays a defensive role. And one of the 7 espers that Academy City is proud of: Mugino Shizuri. They live freely in the darkness of the Academy City, and quietly set their sights on their target...!

This is a story of encounter, friendship, and darkness that eventually leads to a 'terrible incident'!

altTitles.ja: となりの関くんじゅにあ

description.en:
Yokoi-san from "Tonari no Seki-kun" is now back as a mom! With a 2 years old child who's the perfect copy of Seki-kun, an ordinary way of playing won't suffice at all. Everyday is a hard struggle...

But being the determined Yokoi-san, she'll do her best to confront the ideals and reality of parenting!

Jian Chen, the publicly recognized number one expert of the Jianghu. His skill with the sword went beyond perfection and was undefeatable in battle, After a battle with the exceptional expert Dugu Qiubai who had gone missing over a hundred years ago, Jian Chen succumbed to his injuries and died. After death, Jian Chen’s spirit was transmigrated into a completely foreign world. Following an extremely fast growth, his enemies piled up one after another before becoming gravely injured once more. On the gates of death, his spirit had mutated, and from that moment henceforth, he would tread on a completely different path of the art of the sword to become the sword god of his generation

altTitles.ja: 日常

description.de: Währendessen der Titel "alltägliches Leben" bedeutet ist der Inhalt alles andere als alltäglich. Es handelt sich um ein komplett bizarres und verücktes "alltags Leben" von einer gruppe High School Schüler. Das Setting ist eine außergewöhnliche Schule, wo du den Rektor sehen kannst wie er mit einen Reh kämpft oder einen Roboter Arm. Wie auch immer, es gibt immernoch normale Geshichten, wie ein Kartenhaus bauen oder einen Test schreiben für den du dich nicht vorbereitet bist. Der Stil ist süß aber mischt auch extreme Ausdrücke und Actionszenen für Überraschende Komedie Einlagen.
description.en:
While the title suggests a story of simple, everyday school life, the contents are more the opposite. The setting is a strange school where you may see the principal wrestle a deer or a robot's arm hide a rollcake. However there are still normal stories, like making a card castle or taking a test you didn't study for. The art style is cute but mixes with extreme expressions and action sequences for surprising comedy bits.

(The original magazine run ends at Chapter 192)
description.ru: Обычная манга про обыную японскую жизнь.
description.pt-br: Enquanto o título sugere uma história simples de vida escolar, todos os dias, o conteúdo é mais o contrário. O cenário é uma escola estranha, onde você poderá ver o principal lutar com um cervo ou o braço de um robô esconder um bolo. No entanto ainda há histórias normais, como fazer um castelo de cartas ou de um teste que você não estudou. O estilo de arte é bonito, mas se mistura com expressões extremas e sequências de ação para os bits de comédia surpreendentes...

description.en: Geunyeong, infamous for his wild and reckless lifestyle, is a fake shaman trying to scam his way out of a huge debt. One day, during one of his fake rituals, a handsome man appears, begging him to stop, and then collapses. He quickly takes him to his shrine and they spend a passionate night together, only to discover that he's actually a goblin! He offers to pay off Geunyeong's debt in exchange for yang energy. Alright, the deal's on! #Reincarnation #Supernatural #PureHeartedTop #BeautifulBottom #PromiscuousBottom

title.en: I Have Nine Quadrillion Simp Gold Coins

altTitles.vi: Ta Có 90 Tỷ Tiền Liếm Cẩu!

altTitles.en: I Have 90 Billion Licking Gold Coins

description.en: Down-and-out university student Chen Yuan, devotedly pursues Goddess Lin Shutong for three years, gets kicked in the face. In his grief, he accidentally activates the “Licking Dog System” with a memory of 90 trillion Licking Dog Money, solely for licking women. The more you spend, the more you get back, and you can also obtain various attribute bonuses, transforming into a little superhero. It's called the Licking Dog System, but do I really want to be a licking dog? As long as I lick enough, I'll be the king. As long as I prove my love with enough money, I can turn the goddess into my licking dog! At this moment, Chen Yuan, who has undergone a great awakening, embarks on his life as a rich and licking dog.

title.en: I Don't Want to Play Matchmaker!

altTitles.en: I Don't Want to Be a Magpie Bridge
I Don't Want to Be an Ojakgyo
I Don't Want to Be the Magpie Bridge

description.en:
I’ve been reincarnated into a side character of a novel. On top of that, I am the character who is like a magpie bridge in the mentally-exhausting story, *The Guys Around Hestia*.

There is no romance in store for me, and it absolutely horrifies me to think that my family is destined to drown in debt!

I planned on becoming a civil servant, enjoying a life of wealth and honor that I was unable to attain in my previous life but… why are the guys behaving out of character? Why are you blushing in front of me? Why do you keep giving me food?

“Can you Imagine Shushu being shy when looking at someone?”

“Whoa… It’d be amazing if that happens.”

As Cory absent-mindedly said that to Hiley, Eve frowned and murmured under his breath, “Should I run away with her…”

Swan remained silent while he hid his face with his sleeves. His face and ears turned red.

What’s up with you guys? Why are you guys doing other things instead of being obsessed with the female lead? Get yourself together!

This is the survival story of an academy student, Schulaina West, who wants to pursue a wealthy future in a reverse harem novel. 

TL/N: Magpie Bridge is the bridge made by a flock of magpies that connects the two star-crossed lovers Orihime and Hikoboshi in the legend behind the Tanabata festival.

She's a second-year high school student with a single all-consuming question: Will the boy she likes ever really notice her? He's the school's most notorious juvenile delinquent and he's suddenly come to a shocking realization: He's got a huge crush, and now he must tell her how he feels.  
  
Chapter 232 does not exist, there's no chapters missing.  
  
Special Chapters:  
  
bb1 What's up Doc (February 9, 2010)  
Diamonds on the Inside (November 30, 2016)  
Give it Away (March 15, 2017)  
Hello Again (November 8, 2017)
description.pt-br:
Ela é uma estudante do segundo ano do ensino médio com uma única pergunta que a consome: será que o garoto de quem ela gosta realmente a notará? Ele é o delinquente juvenil mais notório da escola e de repente chega a uma conclusão chocante: ele tem uma paixão enorme e agora deve contar a ela como se sente.

O capítulo 232 não existe, não falta nenhum capítulo.

altTitles.ja: 生まれた直後に捨てられたけど、前世が大賢者だったので余裕で生きてます

altTitles.en: Since My Previous Life was a Wise Man, I can Afford to Live.

description.en:
Born to excellent parents, Reus is abandoned shortly after being born due to a mismeasurement of magical aptitude. However, he was a super baby who had the memory and ability of his previous life where he was touted as a Great Sage, and was able to fly, not to mention conversation and walking!

Adventuring with the sacred dragon familiar, Lindworm, enjoy the life of a baby Sage who becomes a person and enjoys freedom!
description.ja:
見た目は赤ちゃん、だけど中身は大賢者!?

世界を変えた最強の魔法使い・大賢者アリストテレウスがその生涯を閉じた…。
だが大賢者アリストテレウスは、死んだ後に転生の魔道具を使い、転生することに成功したのだった。
転生した先は、何百、何千年経ったのかも分からない後の世界の魔法名門家の赤子。
恵まれた人生を歩むはずが、内に宿した規格外の魔力のせいか勘違いされ、生まれた直後に捨てられてしまう…!?
しかし大賢者の能力と記憶を持つ赤子は、聖竜杖リントヴルムをお供に余裕で生き抜くのだった…!!

description.en:
The law is flawed and I'll be the one who will make it perfect. Blame the law that released you.  
  
Art done by the creator of [HIVE](https://www.webtoons.com/en/thriller/hive/list?title_no=65).

description.pt-br: A lei é falha e serei eu quem a tornará perfeita. Culpe a lei que te soltou.

altTitles.ja: 異世界ウォーキング

description.en:
Sora, a Japanese boy who was summoned to another world, gained the skill "Walking." Its effect is that "no matter how much he walks, he never gets tired." Because of this weak skill, the king expelled him from the group of summoned heroes. But when Sora starts walking in another world, he suddenly levels up!
 
Walking had a hidden effect of "gaining 1 EXP for each step taken." He acquired useful skills such as 'Appraisal,' 'Alchemy,' and healing magic...

Getting one skill after another, he became talented just by walking! The adventure to encounter and touch the unknown is about to begin!
description.pt-br:
Sora, um garoto japonês que foi convocado para outro mundo, ganhou a habilidade “Caminhar”. Seu efeito é que “não importa o quanto ande, ele nunca se cansa”. Por causa dessa habilidade fraca, o rei o expulsou do grupo de heróis convocados. Mas quando Sora começa a andar em outro mundo, ele subitamente sobe de nível!

Caminhar tinha um efeito oculto de “ganhar 1 EXP para cada passo dado”. Ele adquiriu habilidades úteis como 'Avaliação', 'Alquimia' e magia de cura...

Adquirindo uma habilidade após a outra, ele se tornou talentoso apenas andando! A aventura de encontrar e tocar o desconhecido está prestes a começar!

altTitles.ja: 美味しんぼ

description.en:
Around the offices of Tozai News, Shiro Yamaoka has a reputation for being over-blunt, under-ambitious, and generally an all-around slacker. So why has he been given the important job of coming up with the "Ultimate Menu" to celebrate the newspaper's 100th anniversary? Because he possesses qualities his other colleagues don't: an exquisitely discerning palate, an encyclopedic knowledge of food and drink, and a masterful touch in the kitchen.

---
- **Won the Shogakukan Manga Award for Seinen/General in 1987**

altTitles.ja: シューデンの公女

description.en:
Bizzare phenomena all over the continent struck fear in the mighty Guelle empire. A sacrifice must be made to appease the heavens. How convenient is it that the royal throne just put out an announcement that they're looking for a tribute bride of noble birth with a hefty sum of money as a reward? Enter Valia Dean, who just overcame her second near-death experience as a destitute orphan. In order to save Karl, the senile mercenary who raised her in her late parents' absence, Valia volunteers to marry Marquess Shuden Gartt, whose reputation for massacre pales in frightfulness to the coldness of his gaze. Valia, hardened by misfortune, orphancy, starvation, and betrayal, accepts what seems to be certain death. Even in marriage, she will not love. It won't matter how handsome, rich, gentle, chivalrous, and caring he is, or how lovingly he behaves as her husband, right?

_

Valia was born into a fallen noble family as the daughter of a knight and lived a sad life. Then, the opportunity of a second life comes to her.

‘Should I live like that again?’

No, she won’t!

Valia decides to become a temple princess in order to live a happier life without having to worry about money. But then, as a princess, she becomes the wife of Shuden, the most handsome man and highest-ranking noble in the Empire…!

But in the future, Shuden falls in love with a new woman from another world. Valia knows this, but she can’t get away from Shuden, who is in love with her!

Valia, Shuden’s princess–what is her fate?

“You are the only one in my life that I will love. If I break my oath…I will pay for it with my life.”

description.cs:
Krásná Athanasia byla zabita rukou svého biologického otce, chladnokrevného císaře Clauda de Alger Obelia! Je to jen hloupá pohádka na dobrou noc... dokud se jedna žena neprobudí a náhle nezjistí, že se stala onou nešťastnou princeznou! Potřebuje plán, jak přežít svůj odsouzený osud, a čas se krátí. Bude se řídit plánem A, žít co nejtišeji, aniž by si jí všiml nechvalně proslulý císař? Plán B, shromáždit dostatek peněz na útěk z paláce? Nebo jí zůstane plán C, sladkými řečičkami se dostat do otcovy přízně?!

Wiedergeboren in einer Welt voller magischer Kräfte und als Tochter des Kaisers! Besser hätte es Athanasia kaum treffen können. Wäre nicht der Kaiser ein grausamer Tyrann, der sein Kind ablehnt und vernachlässigt. Noch als Baby wird Athanasia bewusst, dass in ihrem neuen Leben etwas ganz und gar nicht stimmt! Wenn sie nicht eine Überlebensstrategie entwickelt, wird sie an ihrem 18. Geburtstag auf Geheiß ihres eigenen Vaters sterben. So weit darf es nicht kommen. Also macht sich Athanasia daran ihr Schicksal zu verändern...

description.en:
When I opened my eyes, I had become a princess! But out of all the characters from this romance novel to be reborn into, why must it be the princess whose fate it is to die by the hands of her own blood-related father, the emperor?! If I want to live, I must never enter his sight. However…  

"Since when did this kind of scumbag start living in my castle?"

Without a single tear to shed nor a drop of blood to spill, that cruel and cold emperor, Claude! Will I, the Princess Athanasia who was caught by him, survive?

"I… What should I do…"

---
The beautiful Athanasia was killed at the hands of her own biological father, Claude de Alger Obelia, the cold-blooded emperor! It’s just a silly bedtime story… until one woman wakes up to suddenly find she’s become that unfortunate princess! She needs a plan to survive her doomed fate, and time is running out. 

Will she go with Plan A, live as quietly as possible without being noticed by the infamous emperor? Plan B, collect enough money to escape the palace? Or will she be stuck with Plan C, sweet-talking her way into her father’s good graces?!

description.fa:
آتاناسیا‌ی زیبا در سن ۱۸ سالگی به دست پدر خودش به قتل میرسه، کلود دِ الگر اوبلیا، یه امپراطور بی احساس! این فقط ی داستان شب بچگونس... تا اینکه دختره از خواب بیدار شد و فهمید به یه شاهزاده بدبخت تبدیل شده! اون برای زنده موندن از دست سرنوشتش به نقشه نیاز داشت، و یکمم زمان برای فرار. بنظرتون اون میتونه با نقشه A راحت زندگی کنه بدون اینکه مورد توجه امپراطور قرار بگیره؟ یا نقشه B، که میخواد پول کافی جمع کنه و بعدش بزنه به چاک؟ یاعم نقشه C؟ با شیرین زبونی و کاوایی بودن خودشو تو دل پدرش جا کنه؟!

description.fr:
Areu Areu, je dois sauver ma vie! Quand cette femme se réveille dans le corps d'une princesse, elle comprend vite qu’elle n’est pas devenu n’importe qui. Elle est Athanasia, célèbre héroïne de roman, qui meurt à 18 ans entre les mains de son impitoyable père, l'Empereur Obelia (Claude, pour les intimes). Elle n'a donc que quelques années devant elle pour changer le cours du destin. Evidemment, le plus simple serait de réussir à amadouer ce père qui la déteste. A moins de s'enfuir? Bon, pour cela il faudra déjà marcher plus vite qu'à quatre pattes!!

description.id:
Athanasia yang cantik terbunuh di tangan ayah kandungnya sendiri, Claude de Alger Obelia, kaisar berdarah dingin! Itu hanya cerita pengantar tidur yang konyol ... sampai seorang wanita bangun dan tiba-tiba menemukan dia menjadi putri yang malang itu! Dia membutuhkan rencana untuk bertahan dari nasibnya yang terkutuk, dan waktu hampir habis. Akankah dia pergi dengan Rencana A, hidup setenang mungkin tanpa diketahui oleh kaisar yang terkenal itu? Rencana B, kumpulkan cukup uang untuk kabur dari istana? Atau akankah dia terjebak dengan Rencana C, berbicara manis tentang kebaikan ayahnya?!

description.it:
La bella Athanasia fu uccisa per mano del suo stesso padre biologico, Claude de Alger Obelia, l'imperatore a sangue freddo! E' solo una sciocca storia della buonanotte... Fino a quando una donna si sveglia e scopre all'improvviso di essere diventata quella sfortunata principessa! Ha bisogno di un piano per sopravvivere al suo destino condannato, e il tempo sta per scadere. Sarà lei andare con il piano. A, vivere il più silenziosamente possibile senza essere notato dal famigerato imperatore? Piano B, raccogliere abbastanza soldi per sfuggire al palazzo? O lei sarà bloccata con il piano. C, parlare dolcemente percorrendo la strada per aggraziarsi il padre?

目を覚ましたらとあるネット小説の脇役姫、「アタナシア」というお姫様に転生していた。
しかし、アタナシアは父親の皇帝・クロードに見捨てられた姫で、周囲にも冷たく扱われている。
小説の中では、妹で主人公姫のジェニットに毒を盛った濡れ衣を着せられ、

なんとしても死亡エンドを回避するため、お城を出る準備をこっそり進めていたアタナシアは、

금수저를 입에 물고 태어난 건 좋은데,

Piękna Athanasia została zabita przez własnego biologicznego ojca, Claude de Alger Obelia, zimnokrwistego władcę! To zwykła, głupiutka historia do łóżka... do czasu, aż pewna kobieta budzi się i odkrywa, iż jest tą nieszczęsną księżniczką! Potrzebuje planu, by przetrwać w wskazanej przyszłości, gdy czas ucieka. Pójdzie w ślady Planu A, żyć tak cicho jak to jest możliwe bez zauważenia przez niesławnego władcę? Plan B, zebrać wystarczająco pieniędzy żeby uciec z pałacu? Когда я открыла глаза, то стала принцессой. Но почему из всех персонажей этой истории именно принцессой, судьба которой тесно переплетена с кровавым Императором? Если я хочу выжить, то должна быть неприметной для его глаз. «Когда это в моём дворце начали жить ничтожные людишки?». Человек, у которого нет ни капли сочувствия, ни слезинки — этот холодный император Клод! Неужели Атанасия, пойманная императором, сможет выжить? «Что… Что мне делать?..»

Прекрасна Атанасія загинула від рук власного батька, холоднокровного імператора Клода де Альджео Обелія. Це була просто дурнувата історія, щоб почитати перед сном… поки одна жінка не прокинулась у тілі той бідолашної принцеси! Їй потрібен план, щоб уникнути лихої долі, а час уже спливає. Чи слідуватиме вона плану А, і житиме тихо, не привертаючи уваги сумнозвісного імператора? Чи обере план B: зібрати побільше грошей і втекти з палацу? description.en:
If mercy and kindness can’t save the world, then this time, I choose to kill—

Eternal Slayer! Heavenly Lightning Slash! Sword of Annihilation! As long as you learn the most common sword skills, they can be upgraded to SSS rank?! Divine talent + forbidden skills! I’m the last spark of hope in this apocalypse!

Aria is a Fangirl who likes the idol group Light U up (L.U.P) especially Lexa who is actually her own lover. 

Until one day Aria finds herself pregnant. But instead of being promised responsibility she is met with betrayal, Lexa wishes to kill her. 

However it’s just like receiving a miracle all of a sudden when she wakes up in the body of a man named Lee Jaegu, the youngest prospective member in the same group as the lover who betrayed her. This time, Aria wants to repay what Lexa did to her, but... Something is weird with Jaegu’s body!?
description.id:
Aria adalah seorang Fangirl yang menyukai grup idol Light U up (L.U.P) terutama Lexa yang sebenarnya adalah kekasihnya sendiri. Hingga suatu hari Aria mendapati dirinya hamil.

Bukan pertanggung jawaban yang dijanjikan tetapi pengkhianatan , Lexa tega membunuhnya.

Seperti mendapatkan keajaiban tiba-tiba saja ia terbangun di tubuh seorang laki-laki bernama Lee Jaegu, calon anggota termuda digrup yang sama dengan kekasih yang telah mengkhianatinya. Kali ini, Aria ingin membalas apa yang Lexa lakukan padanya, tapi... ada yang aneh dengan tubuh Jaegu ini?!

A guest from the planet of happiness, the alien Takopi, arrives on Earth to spread happiness throughout the Earth and meets Shizuka, a girl who never smiles. Looks like she has problems at school and with friends... What will the simple-minded Takopi face? An amazing story begins!

Похоже, у неё есть проблемы в школе и с друзьями... С чем столкнётся простодушный Такопи? Потрясающая история начинается!

altTitles.ja: テノゲカ

description.en: Hands. It is one of the most complex organs in the human body, with a particularly complex function and structure. Therefore, there is a doctor who specializes in this organ: <Hand Surgeon>. Isshin Tezuka is a hand surgeon at Ohrando Hospital. He has an aloof appearance and is full of mystery, but the only thing that is certain about him is that he is an extremely talented hand surgeon. This is a life story woven by his hands and the many hands he heals. An authentic medical drama for the new era!
description.ja:
その日、病院に運び込まれた男性は、事故で右腕が切断されていた。絶望する男性の息子に救急スタッフが告げる。「再接着手術を行います――」「くっつくんですか…父の右腕が!?」不可能を可能にするのは【手専門の医者】。

【手外科医】手塚一心。

altTitles.en: First of All, Let's Hide My Younger Brother
First Let's Hide My Younger Brother
Let's Hide My Younger Brother First

altTitles.ja: 弟は今留守番中です

description.en:
I've possessed a character in an R-rated BL manhwa. It's in a world where people, whose craziness ranges from one to ten, appear.

"Franz, can you take off your clothes for a moment?"

"Sister? Wh-why my clothes?"

Their crazy serenade had already begun. Having been faced with the violence my younger brother had to endure, I made a vow.

"Instead of Franz, I'll have *Schuette* instead."

Those people are coming soon. The people who will exterminate my family, and when that's not enough, they'll devour my younger brother's innocence.

"And I'll become a knight to succeed our family and carry on its legacy."

If he doesn't go, I'll die! That's how I thoroughly hid my brother and decided attend all the official events myself. …But something's wrong.

"I do! I love Kyla Vesta!"

"If Young Miss gets hurt, then I'll…"

"I don't feel the need to wait any longer."

Didn't you all like men? Why are you all suddenly obsessed with me?

---
The fate of a girl in a BL novel is a tragic one. Girls are either vaguely helpful, evil, or add nothing to the plot. So what happens when you turn into the older sister of a BL novel protagonist? The older sister who dies a tragic death at the hands of a madman who’s infatuated with your younger brother? You go with your gut instinct: hide him. Hide your brother from everything, especially men, that could harm him and you. That’s the task that Kyla Vesta is set with in this life, and a task that she’s determined to complete.

---

description.en: Constructs — The blade of mankind against the Punishing virus, rekindling the spark of hope in the desperate, burning night. They, too, were once the children of humanity. This is their story, before they plunged into a never-ending long struggle.
description.zh: 这是他们在投身于可能永无尽头的漫长抗争之前的故事。

description.en:
I was banished after being betrayed by my trusted colleagues.
I closed my eyes and swore to take revenge,
but I became the child of a duke in Heiron, the empire that used to butt heads with the Cillophia Kingdom?

The problem was,

"Abuu!"
"Ah, how annoying. Just suck on your pacifier."

Instinctively sucking on the thing that entered my mouth, I abruptly opened my eyes.

'What was I doing until now?'

I had to suck on a pacifier for my brain to function properly!

Without a pacifier, I was just a baby with a head full of flower fields!
This was the biggest humiliation of Grand Magician Hella's life.

'Since this is how things are, let’s return after stealing classified information.'

Secretly, unseen by anyone!
Today, Sherina was once again desperately crawling between pillars and trees.

"That... Just whose kid is that? Who’s the one taking care of their child in this fashion?!"

The angry shout from behind Sherina was none of her business.
description.ko:
"멜라인, 너만큼은 반드시 죽일 거야!"

마법왕국 실로피아의 위대한 대마법사 헬라.
가족처럼 여겼던 제자 멜라인에게 배신 당해
소멸 마법으로 그 존재가 남김없이 사라지는데…

'………애?'

갓난아이로 환생해버린다.
그것도 라이벌이던 헤이런 제국 클라운 공작가의
환영 받지 못한 사생아로!

근데 왜 자꾸 입에선 바보 같은 소리만 나오는 거야…?
그리고 왜 쪽쪽이가 있어야만 머리가 굴러가는 건데?!!

이렇게 된 이상 클라운 가문을 접수하고
배신한 동료들에게 복수할 날을 꿈꾸겠다!

"저건 뭔가?"
"아기입니다. 공작님."
"누가 그걸 몰라서 묻나? 대체 왜 아기가 여기에 있는 건가?"

오늘도 셰리나는 가문을 정복하기 위해
거대한 저택 곳곳을 뽈뽈거리며 기어 다닌다.

--------------------------------
*매주 금요일 22시에 연재됩니다.*

description.en:
Ha-ri made a deal—go on one blind date for her BFF and pretend to be a super-vixen to end all of her unwanted marriage set-ups! Unfortunately, instead of easy money, Ha-ri’s got a headache. Her date is Taemu, her company’s hot new CEO, and he’s got his own plans to get his family to back off by marrying whoever shows up on the date. Should Ha-ri accept his proposal to keep playing pretend? Nothing could go wrong with lying about your real identity while dating the boss... right??

Son amie, une héritière pleine aux as, lui demande de se rendre à un rendez-vous arrangé à sa place. Objectif? Faire fuir le prétendant coûte que coûte! Mais elle ne se doutait pas que ledit prétendant s'avère être son patron, et encore moins que ce cinglé la demande en mariage sans raison et dès la première rencontre! Commence alors un véritable vaudeville hilarant à la sauce coréenne.

altTitles.ja: 白山と三田さん

description.en: Tatsuhiko Shiroyama hates being stuck in the boonies. Greetings from strangers feels fake, part-time job prospects are limited, and he's been "blessed" with the nickname "Niyayama" from his classmates due to his creepy, unsociable attempts at smiling. He turned to the radio as a means to escape, and thinks about nothing more than saving up for a move to Tokyo where he can explore his passions. But Tatsuhiko's life changes forever when he saves a rich CEO from a rice paddy and is set up with his granddaughter, the equally as shy and antisocial Tamiko Mita. Together, the two stumble through the nuances of "dating", and Tatsuhiko's dreary days become a whole lot brighter.

description.en:
After losing it all, Robelia Efferentia wants to give up on life until she learns the true cause of her misery: her uncle, Marlon. Filled with rage, she meets Jade Ferrado, a powerful duke who can help her enact revenge. Robelia asks him to become her sponsor, but he'll only do so if she agrees to marry him. She signs the papers, and with the duke's resources now at her disposal, Robelia is ready to wreak vengeance! However, she soon discovers that her uncle isn't the only one behind her woes...

---
"About your curse, I’ll try to solve it. But in return, please accept me as your blood relative."

From the information in the original, she knew the reason why her mother died. Robelia suddenly remembered her current situation, deprived of everything and pushed to the end. So she decided to take revenge.

She successfully escapes her uncle's control and quickly plans to take back what belongs to her. She reached out to Duke Ferrado, who was known to be fraught with danger, and made her proposal.

"I know a better way. I was thinking about creating a contract marriage, what do you think?"

He suddenly came up with a rather unexpected proposal. Robelia has shaken her uncle’s capital thanks to his support.

In front of her, the original heroine and the enemy's daughter appeared as love rivals to her.

"Well, sis, why did you change so quickly?"

Can Robelia get her revenge perfectly?

"When everything comes to an end, I want to be by your side"

And can she have a happy ending with the man she woos?

description.en:
Vilified by others as a "witch", Evris, the youngest daughter of the House of Bradley, is engaged to Mark, the fifth prince of the Kingdom of Klengel. When he abruptly announces that their engagement is broken off, Evris is plunged into despair. However, someone reaches out to her instead... The cross-dressing crown prince (♀) of a neighboring country!?

This is the story of a red-haired witch who manipulates shadows and a cross-dressing crown prince (♀) who is serving as a body double for her missing older brother. 

The curtain rises on a fantasy romantic comedy of a girl being teased by a princess!

Serialization began in the July 2023 issue of *Yuri Hime*.
description.ja:
「魔女」と罵られるブラッドリー家の末娘・イヴリスは、婚約相手であるクレンゲル王国第5王子・マルクに突然の婚約破棄を宣言されていた。絶望のどん底に落とされるイヴリス。しかし、そんな彼女に手を差し伸べるのは…隣国の男装皇太子!?
影を操る赤髪の魔女令嬢と失踪した兄の影武者となる男装皇子。
王子様系女子に翻弄されるファンタジーラブコメ開幕！
description.ru:
Эйвери, младшая дочь дома Брэдли, проклинаемая окружающими как "ведьма", помолвлена с Марком, пятым принцем королевства Кленгель. Когда он неожиданно объявляет, что их помолвка расторгнута, Эйвери впадает в отчаяние. Однако кто-то протягивает ей руку помощи... Наследный принц (♀) соседней страны?!

Это история о ведьме, управляющей тенями, и о переодетом наследном принце (♀), который является двойником пропавшего старшего брата.

Занавес приподнимается над фэнтезийной романтической комедией о девушке, которую дразнит принцесса!
description.tr:
Bu, gölgeleri manipüle eden kızıl saçlı bir cadı ile kayıp ağabeyinin dublörü olarak rol yapan melez veliaht prensin hikâyesidir.

Diğerleri tarafından “cadı” olarak lanetlenen Bradley Hanesi’nin en küçük kızı Evris, Klengel Krallığı’nın beşinci prensi Mark ile nişanlıdır. Mark aniden nişanı bozduğunu açıklayınca Evris umutsuzluğa kapılır. Ancak biri ona yardım elini uzatacaktır… Komşu ülkelerden birinin karşı cinsin kıyafetlerini giymeyi seven veliaht prensi!? Bir prenses tarafından dalga geçilen bir kızın fantastik romantik komedisinde perde açılıyor!

description.en:
Seto, an office worker, enjoyed being pampered as "Rabi," his beautiful female gaming avatar. One day, his cheerful junior Kujou, just back from abroad, was assigned to work under him. Despite Seto's gloominess, Kujou wanted to befriend him and approached him. Though initially bewildered, Seto, with zero love experience, was quickly knocked out by Kujou's smile…!?

That night, still troubled by this unknown situation, Seto began interacting with people as Rabi in-game and was shocked when "Jack," an old acquaintance, suddenly appeared. To his surprise, it was Kujou, the source of his worries! Determined to keep his IRL identity a secret (Rabi = Seto), and maybe a little too conscious of Kujou, he ended up having a wet dream about him – and then he even let that fact slip…!?

Gloomy bachelor x inexperienced otaku—a double life love comedy!

A younger, tall, conceited female kouhai doing as she pleases towards her short senpai!   
A senpai who is teased about his height and treated as a kid…but unexpectedly shows a manly side of him!  
Will their relationship develop into romance…?

description.en:
The moment she believed she won, everything went back to the beginning.

Kalmia Phlox, whose dead brother came to life, was engaged to a man she was close to, and had a relationship with the man she was in love with. In her very different relationships, she comes closer to a truth she did not know in her previous life…

“It’s greed to wish for something you don’t have the ability to handle!”

“Yes, I know. I’m being greedy. Do I need permission to be greedy?”

She’ll be the Countess again in this life. It’s not a lucky title, but it was won with her own strength, so she’ll be a perfect Countess who is nobody’s scarecrow.

---
Calmia Phlox is given a second chance at life, but this time, she must compete against her beloved twin brother to gain back her coveted status and title as Countess Phlox. What’s more, her nemesis wants to... marry her?! Striking a deal with her former archenemy, Rudbeckia, while struggling between her ambitions and her fondness for her brother, will Calmia reclaim what is hers?

---

description.fr:
«Je récupèrerai ma position, même si je dois m'associer à mon futur ennemi juré.»

Au moment où elle avait tout obtenu après avoir tué son ennemi de toujours, Kalmia Fox revient vingt ans en arrière avant qu'elle ne soit nommée la successeur de son père. Et pas n'importe quel jour. Kalmia revient au moment où son destin entier a basculé, le jour de la mort de son frère jumeau. Découvrant des vérités jusque là insoupçonnées dans cette nouvelle vie, Kalmia se jure de récupérer son titre de comtesse qu'elle estime lui revenir de droit. Et pour cela, elle devra travailler main dans la main avec son pire ennemi.

---

description.th:
ชั่วขณะที่คิดว่ากำจัดศัตรูที่เกลียดจนเข้าไส้สำเร็จและได้มาซึ่งทุกสิ่งทุกอย่างแล้ว เวลาก็กลับหวนมาสู่อดีตเมื่อ 20 ปีก่อนที่ยังไม่ได้รับการแต่งตั้งให้เป็นทายาทผู้สืบทอดตระกูล และศัตรูคู่แค้น 'รูธเบคเกีย' ก็ได้ปรากฏตัวต่อหน้า 'คัลมีอา' อีกครั้ง มิหนำซ้ำยังได้รับข้อเสนอให้หมั้นหมายกับเขา แต่เพื่อตำแหน่งผู้สืบทอดที่ตนปรารถนาจากก้นบึ้งของหัวใจแล้ว คัลมีอาจึงยอมร่วมมือกับรูธเบคเกีย เอาชนะศัตรูและคว้าตำแหน่งนั้นมาด้วยพลังของตนเอง โดยที่ไม่ได้เป็นเพียงแค่หุ่นเชิดของใครบางคน

description.zh-hk:
在處理了眼中釘的宿敵，認為得到一切的瞬間，就輪迴了。

二十年前，在自己被任命為接班人之前，她的宿敵再次出現在心煩意亂的卡爾米亞面前。

宿敵魯德貝基亞提出訂婚，雖然陷入混亂，但卡爾米亞還是為了自己夢寐以求的繼承人位置而與他攜手。

這輩子她也要成為伯爵，用自己的力量去爭取，去打敗宿敵。

不是作為誰的傀儡而是一個完整的伯爵。
